/*
Title: Grant access to a user at the server-level for SQL dedicated/provisioned Pools

Description: This sample shows how to creat a user and grant permissions using T-SQL.

Tags: Security, Login, Roles, SQL Dedicated, SQL Pools

*/
--1.a Create LOGIN for an Azure AD account.To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.

CREATE LOGIN [v-weiszh@microsoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
go
--1.b Create a Login for a user. To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.
CREATE LOGIN v-weiszh@microsoft.com WITH PASSWORD = '*******';


--2.a Create USER for the Azure AD account
use master -- Use your DB name
CREATE USER weishu FROM LOGIN [v-weiszh@microsoft.com]

--2.b Create USER for a SQL Auth account
CREATE USER weishu FROM LOGIN v-weiszh@microsoft.com

--Example to add the user to the db_owner role

EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'weishu';
